refnamediv.refpurpose: Dumps the internal document into a string using HTML formatting

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Creates an HTML document from the dom representation. This function usually is called after building a new dom document from scratch as in the example below.

example.title: Creating a simple HTML document header
example.programlisting:
createElement("HTML"); $root = $doc->appendChild($root); $head = $doc->createElement("HEAD"); $head = $root->appendChild($head); $title = $doc->createElement("TITLE"); $title = $head->appendChild($title); $text = $doc->createTextNode("This is the title"); $text = $title->appendChild($text); echo "
";
echo $doc->saveHTML();
echo "
"; ?>

refsect1.para: See also DOMDocument->loadHTML(), DOMDocument->loadHTMLFile() and DOMDocument->saveHTMLFile().
